CustomField.description: This field is required. It must be manually populated. When enabled, the spread statement type is treated as a template and can be used to clone additional spread statement types. When disabled, it cannot be used to clone additional spread statement types. If its parent "LLC_BI__Underwriting_Bundle__c" is marked as a template, then the spread statement type is also a template. By default, this is disabled.
CustomField.label: Is Template
